settings.section_dec: Lion's Mane is an edible mushroom that has been used in ancient Chinese medicine as a natural and powerful adaptogen to support brain and neurological health. Studies show that Lion's Mane may support brain health, improve mood and boost memory & focus.
Medium Chain Triglycerides are a type of fat derived from coconut oil. They are instantly converted to ketones which is used by the body for long lasting energy.
Acacia fiber is a natural prebiotic fiber derived from the sap of the Acacia tree. It's a powerful superfood that feeds our healthy gut bacteria and supports our bodyies digestive health.

settings.advantages_text: MCT provides the brain with instant energy and Lion’s mane improves focus and concentration. A powerful combination!
MCT keeps the blood sugar in check and Lion's Mane have also been shown to lower blood sugar.
Lion’s Mane may stimulate the growth of new brain cells, repair damaged cells and promote the creation of new neurons.
New research on mice has found that lion’s mane has anti-inflammatory effects that can reduce symptoms of anxiety and depression.

settings.benifits_subtext: Only 3 ingredients, all natural. That’s it.
C8 is the most sought after MCT because it is converted to energy most effectively.
Carefully selected 8:1 dual organic extract. Only using the fruiting bodies (the most potent part of the mushroom).
Acacia fiber is a natural prebiotic fiber that feeds our healthy gut bacteria

settings.section_text: Lion's Mane is an edible mushroom that has been used in traditional Chinese medicine for thousands of years. It contains two special compounds (hericenones and erinacines) that may stimulate the growth and repair of brain cells. This is why it’s believed to improve brain health and cognitive performance.

...when you need to get shit done!  MCT fuels your brain with instant energy, while Lion's Mane makes you focused 
and alert. This combination makes you unstoppable!
When used daily, studies show that Lion’s mane may support brain health by stimulating the growth of new brain cells, repairing damaged cells and promote the creation of new neurons.
Feeling tired in the afternoons? MCT boosts your energy and keeps your blood sugar stable. No more yawning in the office!
MCT gives you instant but also long lasting energy to crush it at the gym! It’s especially powerful for endurance sports like running and cycling.
Never feeling really satisfied? MCT makes you feeling full for longer and help you resist the constant urge to snack!

settings.section_title: Add 2-3 scoops to water and sweep
Add to your coffee or tea
Or add power to other snacks like yogurt or energy balls

settings.section_text: MCT stands for Medium Chain Triglycerides which are fatty acids derived mainly from coconut oil. MCT’s are shorter in lenght than most other fats and therefore takes a shortcut in the body. Because of this, the body can turn MCT into energy far more quickly and through a totally different pathway, compared to other types of fats. Ketones are a powerful fuel for your body that will instantly improve energy, increase fat burn, reduce cravings and improve your mental performance and focus. MCT’s are often used by athletes who needs instant and sustained energy to boost their performance and improve endurance during a tough workout. MCT’s are also very helpful for weight loss, assisting to keep blood sugar levels stable and control appetite by increasing the feeling of fullness. MCT-oil also improves gut health and reduces inflammation.

Acacia is a natural prebiotic fiber derived from the sap of the Acacia tree. It's a powerful superfood  that feeds our healthy gut bacteria and supports your body's digestive health, which is the foundation of a healthy body. Acacia fiber is great to include in your diet for many everyday health benefits. Especially to promote a healthy microbiome Your microbiome (gut bacteria) is the trillions of live bacteria living in your body and these organisms are crucial to our overall health. Researcher are starting to understand just how much of our health is starting in the gut and how important it is to keep it healthy and flourishing. Our Microbiome can be compared to a garden where the beautiful flowers are the good bacteria and the weed is the bad bacteria. To stay healthy we need to grow the flowers and minimize the weed. To grow our healthy bacterias in the gut we need to give them plenty of nourishing food (prebiotics=soluble fibers) and Acacia fiber is the holy grail of prebiotics.

settings.section_title: Can I use MCT even if I'm not doing Keto?
settings.section_text: Yes you can. But as MCT increases the ketone levels in the body it is extra helpful for those who are following the keto diet, as ketones are their primary source of fuel. But no matter if you're following the keto diet or not you will still benefit from using MCT, as ketones are a powerful source of fuel for everyone.

settings.section_title: Does Lion's mane mushroom get you high?
settings.section_text: No. Lion's mane will not get you high and it’s not psychoactive.

settings.section_title: What type of Lion's Mane extract do you use?
settings.section_text:
We use an organic 8:1 extract which means that it is eight times more concentrated than regular mushroom powder.

The extract is made only from the fruiting body of the mushroom (the acutal mushroom that grows above the ground). This ensures a high quality extract that is not diluted with anything else than the actual mushroom and its active compounds.
